description: I’d been thinking about making a sort of “burger” with quinoa and vegetables when I saw a recipe for chard cakes in the Dining section of The Times I combined the two ideas and came up with these quinoa and chard cakes, which you can serve as a main dish or a side A few days later, I made the same recipe but used spinach, which is lower in sodium, instead of chard (see variation below)
title: Quinoa and Chard Cakes
title_page: Quinoa and Chard Cakes Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
I’d been thinking about making a sort of “burger” with quinoa and vegetables when I saw a recipe for chard cakes in the Dining section of The Times. I combined the two ideas and came up with these quinoa and chard cakes, which you can serve as a main dish or a side. A few days later, I made the same recipe but used spinach, which is lower in sodium, instead of chard (see variation below). Top these cakes with yogurt spiked with puréed garlic.
Featured in: Proper Uses For Quinoa.
